Package Calendar

Class CalendarEvents

java.lang.Object
Calendar.CalendarEvents
public class CalendarEvents
extends java.lang.Object
The base of the Calendar which contains all the events Takes events of specific date and adds into HashMap. HashMap is then sorted by time

  • Method Details

    • add

      public static java.lang.Boolean add​(Event e)
      Adds an event to the calendar
      Parameters:
      e - - the event to be added
      Returns:
      - true if the add was successful, and false if there was a conflict

    • timeCheck

      public static java.lang.Boolean timeCheck​(java.time.LocalTime st, java.time.LocalTime et, java.time.LocalDate ld)
      Checks for conflicts when creating events
      Parameters:
      st - - start time
      et - - end time
      ld - - date requested
      Returns:
      - returns a true if there is a conflict, false is there is no conflict

    • getEvents

      public java.lang.String getEvents​(java.time.LocalDate ld, java.lang.String check)
      Gets all events on a selected date
      Parameters:
      ld - - the selected date
      check - - the view that is selected
      Returns:
      - returns a String of the events for the appropriate view

    • viewAgenda

      public java.lang.String viewAgenda​(java.time.LocalDate sd, java.time.LocalDate ed)
      Shows the agenda by recursively collecting all dates in the range
      Parameters:
      sd - - start date for the range
      ed - - end date for the range
      Returns:
      - returns a String of all agenda events
